task_summary: The robot locates and opens an oven door using perception, approach, alignment, grasp, actuation, and verification steps as revealed in the video frames.

task_long_description.overview: This task requires a robot arm to perceive, approach, and open the oven door in a kitchen setting. The workspace contains an oven/cabinet module; the oven door is initially closed. The robot must locate the handle/edge, align its gripper, grasp, actuate the door open, and confirm completion. Visual perception and sequential manipulation ensure safe, successful actuation.
preconditions: Robot is operational and positioned near oven.
Oven door is closed and accessible.
No obstructions in door swing path.
stepwise_plan: Check oven door is visible or scan if needed.
Detect oven door for precise location.
Align end-effector with door's grasping point.
Check if oven door is open.
success_criteria: Oven door is visibly open by sufficient margin.
Robot safely disengages from door after opening.
failure_and_recovery: Failure to see object: retry scan up to 3 times;
Detect or grasp error: attempt fallback if possible;
Open actuation fails: abort and alert for manual intervention.
task_long_description.termination: Task completes when oven door is confirmed open and robot has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the oven door is visible in sensor data.
Robot scans field of view in line pattern to relocate oven door.
Runs perception pipeline for precise oven door localization.
Moves gripper above the door grasping region.
Aligns the end-effector with oven door for grasp.
Computes a feasible side grasp pose for the oven door.
Executes the grasp motion using computed pose.
Performs the opening action on the oven door.
Checks if oven door is open.
Robot retreats from oven after opening.

failure_modes: Oven door occluded or not detected
Door stuck or open actuation fails
recovery_strategy: Retry scan if oven door not visible (3 attempts)
Abort on repeated failure or after unsuccessful open
assumptions: The only movable door in the scene is the oven door (from visual evidence);
Handle is assumed present and accessible on the oven door lower edge;
No explicit mention of force/tolerance in instruction or visual cue for forceful or gentle opening;
robot's grasp computed by side strategy based on imagery;

expected_success_criteria: Oven door is open and remains open after robot disengages
